Initial Visit.details: General health screening, risk assessment, and counseling

Blood Tests.details: Blood type, Rh factor, complete blood count

Dating & Ultrasound.details: Dating scan and fetal heartbeat check

Follow-up Visit.details: Assessment of fetal growth and maternal weight

Anomaly Scan.details: Detailed anatomical survey of the fetus

Routine Check.details: Monitoring blood pressure, weight, and fetal heartbeat

Preterm Labor Assessment.details: Assessment for signs of preterm labor and fetal growth

Final Visit.details: Prepare for delivery, review labor plan, monitor maternal and fetal health
